hadiths.text: Narrated Rubai bint Mu`adh bin Afra:We used to go for Military expeditions along with Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and provide the people with water, serve them and bring the dead and the wounded back to Medina

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُدَاوِي الرَّجُلُ الْمَرْأَةَ أَوِ الْمَرْأَةُ الرَّجُلَ
chapter.eng-name: May a man treat a woman or a woman treat a man?
